author: jstar.
content:
Hoping this 'one-pager' on StakeWise V3 proves fruitful: https://docsend.com/view/t97fhxsmdaxxpy9g

The StakeWise V3 upgrade is going live imminently and very relevant given the latest blog post by <@273808422753796097> on protocol/staking pool changes to improve decentralisation. Worth a read to quickly get up to speed on a new innovation coming to market in the delegated/liquid ETH staking space.
